login.passwordLength: The password must be at least 9 characters long
login.passwordEmpty: The password must not be empty
login.passwordComplex: Password must contain at least one capital letter
login.passwordNoDigits: Password must contain at least one number
login.title: Login
login.passwordInfo: Password must contain at least 8 characters, 1 capital letter and 1 number
login.termsNotChecked: Agree to the terms of use
login.termsText1: General rules of conduct on the site:
login.termsText2:
Let's start with the fact that there are hundreds of people of different religions and beliefs communicating on the site, and they are all valid visitors to our site, so if we want this community of people to function, we need rules. 
We strongly recommend that you familiarize yourself with these rules, it will take you only five minutes, but it will save us and you time and help make the site more interesting and organized. 
To begin with, you need to behave respectfully to all site visitors on our site. 
Do not insult the participants, it is always unnecessary. 
If you have any complaints, please contact the administrators or moderators (use your private messages). 
Insulting other visitors is considered one of the most serious violations and is severely punished by the administration. 
We strictly prohibit racism, religious and political speech. 
Thank you in advance for your understanding and for wanting to make our site more polite and friendly.
login.termsText3: The following is strictly prohibited on the site:
login.termsText4:
Messages that do not relate to the content of the article or the context of the discussion - insulting and threatening site visitors - comments prohibit statements containing inappropriate language, degrading human dignity, inciting international enmity - spam, as well as advertising of any goods and services, other resources, mass media 
or events that do not relate to the context of the discussion of the article Let's respect each other and the site where you and other readers come to communicate and express your opinions. 
The site administration reserves the right to delete comments or part of them if they do not meet these requirements.  
If you break the rules, you may be given a warning. 
In some cases, the ban can be granted without warning. 
Write to the administrator about removing bananas.  
Insulting administrators or moderators is also punishable by a ban - respect the work of others.
